import React, { useEffect, useState,Component } from "react"; import Category from "../Category"; import Cart from "./Cart"; import { Outlet } from "react-router-dom" import Loading from "../Loading/Loading"; class Filter extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { openTab: 1, loading: false, posts: [] }; } componentDidMount() { fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products") .then(res => res.json()) .then( (result) => { this.setState({ loading: true, posts: result.data }); console.log(result) }, (error) => { this.setState({ loading: true, error }); } ) } render() { const { openTab, loading, posts } = this.state; if (!loading) { return ; } return (
{ posts.map((post, idx) => (
) ) }

) } } const root = ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')); root.render();
